      • getApkFileStatus

        public static int getApkFileStatus(Context context,
                   DataappInfo newinfo)
        getApkFileStatus
        Parameters:
        newinfo -
        Returns:
        status with the new application info
        return 0: installed with same signature
        return 1: installed with different signature
        return 2: no need update
        return 3: not installed
